name: bb-ultra-extended
description: Multitool browser add-on for Blackboard Learn Ultra
author: DraakjeYoblama

scripts.build:firefox: npm run copy:firefox && npm run build-web-ext
scripts.build:chrome: npm run copy:chrome && npm run build-web-ext
scripts.copy:firefox: npm run copy:common && echo F|xcopy /Y src\manifest-v2.json _dist\manifest.json
scripts.copy:chrome: npm run copy:common && echo F|xcopy /Y src\manifest-v3.json _dist\manifest.json
